com.safenetinc.jcprov.params

Class CK_ECIES_PARAMS

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.safenetinc.jcprov.params.CK_ECIES_PARAMS

  • public class CK_ECIES_PARAMS
extends java.lang.Object
    Parameter for the
    CKM.ECIES
    mechanism.

    Further information is provided in the PKCS#11 standard and the Programmers Manual.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      long dhPrimitive
      Diffie-Hellman Primitive (CKDHP) used to derive the shared secret value
      long encScheme
      the encryption scheme (CKES) used to transform the input data
      long kdf
      key derivation function (CKD) used on the shared secret value
      long macScheme
      the MAC scheme (CKMS) used for MAC generation or validation
      byte[] pSharedData1
      the key derivation padding data shared between the two parties
      byte[] pSharedData2
      the MAC padding data shared between the two parties
      long ulEncKeyLenInBits
      the bit length of the key to use for the encryption scheme
      long ulMacKeyLenInBits
      the bit length of the key to use for the MAC scheme
      long ulMacLenInBits
      the bit length of the MAC scheme output
      long ulSharedDataLen1
      the length in bytes of the key derivation shared data
      long ulSharedDataLen2
      the length in bytes of the MAC shared data

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CK_ECIES_PARAMS()
      Values initialised to 0 or null
      CK_ECIES_PARAMS(long dhPrimitive, long kdf, long ulSharedDataLen1, byte[] pSharedData1, long encScheme, long ulEncKeyLenInBits, long macScheme, long ulMacKeyLenInBits, long ulMacLenInBits, long ulSharedDataLen2, byte[] pSharedData2)
      Values initialised as specified
      CK_ECIES_PARAMS(long dhPrimitive, long kdf, long encScheme, long ulEncKeyLenInBits, long macScheme, long ulMacKeyLenInBits, long ulMacLenInBits)
      Simplified constructor where no Shared data is used
